T02D2197:79a-1: badzra tsanta kro dha s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2197:79a-3: khro bo rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2197:79a-4: dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2197:79a-5: dang po sgrub pa po dkon mchog gsum la dang /
T02D2197:79a-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02D2197:79a-8: bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2197:79a-9: de nas stong pa nyid du bsams la /
T02D2197:79b-0: nyi ma'i steng du h'um las @79b yang dag par
T02D2197:79b-1: byung ba'i rdo rje gtum po sku mdog nag po
T02D2197:79b-4: phyag g-yas pas gnam lcags kyi rdo rje zhun ma bsnams pa /
T02D2197:79b-5: g-yon pas thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D2197:79b-10: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2197:79b-11: bskal pa'i me'i nang na bzhugs pa /
T02D2197:79b-12: sku las khro chung dang khyung mang po 'phro ba cig gsal bar bskyed la /
T02D2197:79b-13: snying gar h'um la sngags 'dis bskor la bzlas so //
T02D2197:79b-14: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2197:79b-16: / de nas gdon gzhom par 'dod na /
T02D2197:79b-17: rdo rje de khyung nag po phyag gnyis kyis sprul mgo nas za ba /
T02D2197:79b-18: gshog pa gdengs pa mchu sder rdo rje 'bar bar bsam /
T02D2197:79b-19: g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub thur du bsngams pa las me 'bar bar bsams la /
T02D2197:79b-21: h'um phat sha na ro ma h'a tsanda badzra ga ru na de ba then phyung /
T02D2197:79b-22: sa ga n'a ga snying la gzir /
T02D2197:79b-23: thum ril rbad drag po gsum dang ldan par bzlas so //
T02D2197:79b-24: de nas gdon gsad par 'dod na /
T02D2197:79b-25: rang gi rmi lam du ci byung ba thams cad bsreg cing sngags 'di bzlas so//
T02D2197:79b-26: aom n'a ga tsanda tshal pa au rta ke / n'a ga tsitta shakti tshal pa nam /
T02D2197:79b-27: n'a ga tri sa ya ti /
T02D2197:79b-29: n'a ga kro dha bi da r'a dza ya /
T02D2197:79b-31: dul dul rbud rbud thum ril dza:dza:/
T02D2197:79b-32: lan gsum gyis thub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2197:79b-34: gtum chung khra thogs ma'i sgrub thabs rgyal po zla ba'i snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
